thread.title: Kathleen Greville
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Kathleen Greville

author: Kathleen Greville
title: Kathleen Greville
text: I wanted to get away from the Canadian winter for at least 6 weeks,I spoke to a agent named Jenn Browne,I told her my budget she worked so hard on my behalf and we came up with the Cook Islands she got me two months in paradise,she told me if I was visiting Rarotonga I should visit aitutaki as well,that was excellent advice,to go all that way and not see the most spectacular lagoon on on earth would have been a mistake,everything went as planned,I would recommend Goway travel to anyone thank you Jenn.ðŸŒ´
